trends: There have been no other sightings in Robertsonpet
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsMyself along with my wife children and dad had moon light dinner in the open floor on top of my residence and was just relaxing and enjoying the night skies, all of a sudden I noticed two lights (like stars) falling from a higher altitude to a lower altitude, both approximately stop at the same altitude and appeared to move like a swimming fish for about a moment and then moved in a straight line from south-west to north-east. Since I was sleeping and gazing the sky, I was able to notice this immediately; I first thought it might be a airplane, but later I realized it was an odd object, I was curious and fascinated to watch the object, but unfortunately I was able to watch this only for about 5-6 Secs due to physical obstacles around my residence.
Summary: Two orange colored objects were flying in sync with each other towards north-east
